description: Microsoft is warning of Windows crashing with the blue screen of death on some ASUS laptop models when trying to upgrade to the latest version of the operating system, Windows 11 version 24H2. [...]
title: Microsoft blocks Windows 11 24H2 on two ASUS models due to crashes

description: The Bumblebee malware loader has been spotted in new attacks recently, more than four months after Europol disrupted it during 'Operation Endgame' in May. [...]
title: Bumblebee malware returns after recent law enforcement disruption
